r2dii.data 0.0.1.9001

  • r2dii

A loanbook dataset for demonstration

Source: R/loanbook_demo.R
loanbook_demo.Rd

This is a public dataset that may be used as a template for banks to create their own loanbook datasets. It is also useful for examples and tests.

loanbook_demo

Format

An object of class spec_tbl_df (inherits from tbl_df, tbl, data.frame) with 320 rows and 19 columns.

See also

data_dictionary

Other demo datasets: ald_demo, data_dictionary, iso_codes, overwrite_demo, region_isos

Examples

head(loanbook_demo)
#> # A tibble: 6 x 19
#>   id_loan id_direct_loant… name_direct_loa… id_intermediate… name_intermedia…

#> 2 L2      C293             Yuamen Changyua… NA               NA              
#> 3 L3      C292             Yuama Ethanol L… IP5              Yuama Inc.      
#> 4 L4      C299             Yudaksel Holdin… NA               NA              
#> 5 L5      C305             Yukon Energy Co… NA               NA              
#> 6 L6      C304             Yukon Developme… NA               NA              
#> # … with 14 more variables: id_ultimate_parent <chr>,
